So my kids upsized their meal yesterday at the Siglap outlet as the promo at the cash counter said it was free with upsize. To their horror, after the billing was done....they were told the offer starts from 5th July!! Nowhere on the cash counter promo was a date mentioned! On pointing this out, we received the worst customer service I have seen at any Mc Donald in any country! The cashier & manager just rudely replied that they dont hv stock and its not their problem that the promo doesnt mention a date! I hope someone from McD is reading this...coz it isnt about a Glass...its the pathetic customer service! Please make good.

23.post_text: Hi everyone, many of you have written us with questions on the current Nugget Sauce trial and we appreciate all your feedback. This trial is currently ongoing in some of our restaurants in the north of Singapore, and our aim is not to sell sauce, but to find a way to reduce wastage. For example, if you order a 6pc Chicken McNuggets you can still get 2 units of sauce free, but if you want 3 or more units there’s a small charge. The majority of our customers don’t use that much sauce, and shouldn’t have to pay more. It’s a trial so let us know what you think! Email ops@sg.mcd.com with your feedback.
